Class ImmutablePlayer

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.network.messages.gameMessages.ImmutablePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class ImmutablePlayer extends Object implements Serializable
Immutable version of Player to be sent to the client.

      public int getPublicPoints()
      Getter for the public points, i.e. the points earned from the common goal tokens or from groups of adjacent tiles of the same type in the bookshelf.
